content: easy mesh/net water bottle pattern calls for a g/6-4 25mm hook ***errata/corrections *** yardage basic bottle bag with 80 row handle is approximately 60 yards you will need more if you make your handle longer ~ ch2 and ch1 at beginning of row do not count as beginning st ~ side row 2 should read chain 1 turn decrease single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet decrease *clarification * ~ handle row 1- shown on her blog as 1- 100 or 200 you may make this as long or short as needed for clarification the row are ch1 single_crochet turn
